name: Dictionary Glory!
description:
Try to enter in as many words that fit the prompt as you can correctly! 

Choose from Time Trials mode and Lives Mode!

Game was made with Processing and Java, as a mini-project for my AP Computer Science class.

Seeing as how this is a game I made in less in a week, during school, and in a software not built for making games, well... Don't expect too much out of this one!

Maybe I'll work on it some more! Add some sound, keep a high score, or just make it look nicer. I may even make a YouTube video about the creation process :o

Thought I may as well upload it to my page! Hope you enjoy! :D
